import React, {useState} from "react"; import Axios from "axios" const AddEmployee = () => { const [employee, setEmployee] = useState({ user_id: "", work_email: "", f_name: "", m_name: "", s_name: "", personal_email: "", contact_num: 0, dob: "", p_address: "", c_address: "", date_hired: "", sex: "", created_by: "", updated_by: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { setEmployee(prev => ({ ...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})) } return(
